prompt: Create a chat like interface with a textbox and a send button
refinedPrompt: Create a real-time chat interface with a responsive design. Include a text input field for users to enter their messages and a send button to submit them. Display the conversation history in a scrollable area above the input field, showing both sent and received messages. Implement a backend system to handle multiple users and enable real-time communication using technologies like WebSockets or long-polling.
